title: Drawing the line
creator_credit: Film Australia, Malcolm Otton and Ian Walker
brief_description: Cartoonists Patrick Cook, Bruce Petty and Les Tanner take the audience through the growth of the nation depicted in its cartoons, and compare the attitudes of contemporary and early Australian society. Exploits a rich heritage of political cartooning.
creator_credit_for_label: Film Australia, Malcolm Otton and Ian Walker
